disabled.description: Set if a pill is disabled

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

i18nErrorLabel.description: Alternative text for the error icon in the error variant

onBlur.description: Event handler called when a pill is blurred

onDismiss.description: Event handler called when a pill is dismissed

onFocus.description: Event handler called when a pill is focused

onSelect.description: Event handler called when a pill is selected

selected.description: Set if a pill is in a selected state

variant.description: Sets the variant of the pill

display.description: Determines if the FormPillGroup should be rendered as a flex or inline-flex container

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

i18nKeyboardControls.defaultValue: 'Press Delete or Backspace to remove. Press Enter to toggle selection.'
i18nKeyboardControls.description: Visually hidden string that has instructions for how to remove and select pills with a keyboard.
